instructions_to_main_agent: 2. THEME: Override tailwind.config.js colors to match the 'colors' section above. FORCE DARK MODE by default in index.css (add 'dark' class to html or body).
3. FONTS: Add the Google Fonts import to index.css. Apply 'font-sans' to body and 'font-heading' to h1-h6.

4. COMPONENTS: Use Shadcn for complex interactive elements (Forms, Dialogs, Drawers) but style them with the 'cards.style' defined above. Remove default white backgrounds from Shadcn cards and replace with 'bg-white/5'.
5. IMAGES: Use the provided image URLs. Do not use placeholders unless absolutely necessary.
6. BILINGUAL: Implement a simple state toggle (Context or Zustand) for EN/ES language switching. Default to ES (Spanish) as it is in Mexico, or EN if specified.
7. MAP: Use a standard iframe for the Google Map location.
8. ANIMATION: Use framer-motion for simple fade-ins on scroll (viewport={{ once: true }}).
9. TESTING: Add data-testid to all buttons, inputs, and links.
universal_guidelines: Do not use gradients for text unless it is a very large heading.
Ensure all text has sufficient contrast against the dark background (use text-gray-200 or text-white).
